description: Example Hyperledger Fabric configuration for PyMedSec
setup_instructions: 1. Install Hyperledger Fabric Python SDK: pip install fabric-sdk-py
2. Set up your Hyperledger Fabric network
3. Deploy the audit chaincode to your network
4. Update the network_profile path to your network.json file
5. Configure the appropriate channel, chaincode, and organization details

chaincode_requirements.description: The audit chaincode should implement these functions:
functions: submitDigest(digest, metadata) - Store audit digest on blockchain
verifyDigest(digest, txId) - Verify digest exists and return details
getTransaction(txId) - Get transaction details by ID
